name: nowhere (KikooDX, Masséna)
description:
nowhere is a mod of Celeste Classic created by KikooDX and Massena. While the original game focuses on vertical level layouts, we decided to switch it up to horizontal and see what happens. We also experimented with difficulty curve, atmosphere, soundtrack, level/world design and game pacing among some other things. Beware, some levels require speedtech to be completed. This is a pretty hard mod! We hope you will enjoy nowhere.

Controls:

  • Z ─ Jump
  • X ─ Dash
  • Arrow Keys ─ Move
  • E ─ Toggle Flashing Effects

Special thanks to the original creators of Celeste Classic Maddy Thorson and Noel Berry.
